document.full_text: low levels of radioactive iodine believed to be from japan's fukushima nuclear power plant have been detected in the atmosphere in south carolina, north carolina and florida, officials said on monday.
document.title: officials monitor radiation in u.s. air, rainwater
lines_and_colors: low levels of radioactive iodine believed to be from japan's fukushima nuclear power plant have been detected in the atmosphere in south carolina, north carolina and florida, officials said on monday.
